i cry while u sleep

but also while you're awake
About
Home



Hi I am Bria.
I started a journal comic in 2006 on the theory that I am incredibly easy to draw, even though I could not, in fact, draw (see icrywhileusleep v0.1 in the sidebar). That didn't last terribly long.
Then around 2014 I remembered that I used to like to draw and stuff, so I started doing that again, which reminded me that I had done that comic thing, so I figured, hey, why not.

Contact:
bria at icrywhileusleep . com
I accidentally use twitter: @calypsomatic
I use tumblr too, it's mostly just this comic but sometimes I post secret tumblr-only things there: icrywhileusleep.tumblr.com


Oh also sometimes I think some photos I take are mildly acceptable: my flickr
I'm probably also some other places on the internet that I've forgotten.

Dudes I totally have a Patreon
(The money goes to charity.)
